Roles.title: AI ML Product Manager
Roles.description: Focuses on developing products powered by artificial intelligence. Requires knowledge of AI and machine learning technologies.

Roles.title: AI Product Manager
Roles.description: Focuses on developing products powered by artificial intelligence. Requires knowledge of AI and machine learning technologies.

Roles.title: Product Manager AI
Roles.description: Focuses on developing products powered by artificial intelligence. Requires knowledge of AI and machine learning technologies.

Roles.title: AI Product Manager AI ML
Roles.description: Focuses on developing products powered by artificial intelligence. Requires knowledge of AI and machine learning technologies.

Roles.title: AI/ML Product Manager
Roles.description: Focuses on developing products powered by artificial intelligence. Requires knowledge of AI and machine learning technologies.

Roles.title: Product Manager, ai ml
Roles.description: Focuses on developing products powered by artificial intelligence. Requires knowledge of AI and machine learning technologies.

Roles.title: Growth Product Manager
Roles.description: Specializes in driving user growth and engagement through product strategy and development.

Roles.title: Product Manager
Roles.description: Often a generalist role, involves overseeing the development and success of a product from ideation to launch.

Roles.title: Technical Product Manager
Roles.description: Focuses on the technical aspects of product development, often requiring a background in engineering or computer science.

Roles.title: Senior Product Manager
Roles.description: A more experienced PM role, responsible for managing larger or more complex products and possibly leading a team of PMs.

Roles.title: Product Owner
Roles.description: Common in Agile frameworks, responsible for defining the vision of the product and managing the product backlog.

Roles.title: Associate Product Manager
Roles.description: An entry-level PM role, typically involves supporting senior PMs in various aspects of product development.

Roles.title: Director of Product Management
Roles.description: A leadership role overseeing the entire product management function within an organization.

Roles.title: VP of Product Management
Roles.description: Senior executive role, responsible for the strategic direction and success of all product-related activities in a company.

Roles.title: Product Marketing Manager
Roles.description: Focuses on marketing the product, including messaging, branding, and go-to-market strategy.

Roles.title: Chief Product Officer (CPO)
Roles.description: Top-level executive role responsible for the overall product strategy and direction in an organization.

Roles.title: Digital Product Manager
Roles.description: Specializes in digital products such as websites, mobile apps, and software applications.

Roles.title: Product Strategy Manager
Roles.description: Focuses on long-term strategy and planning for the product's direction and growth.

Roles.title: User Experience Product Manager
Roles.description: Concentrates on the user experience aspect of product design and development.

Roles.title: Data Product Manager
Roles.description: Manages products that are heavily data-driven or data-related, requiring a good understanding of data analysis.

Roles.title: E-commerce Product Manager
Roles.description: Specializes in products sold through online platforms, focusing on online sales strategies and customer experience.

Roles.title: Product Operations Manager
Roles.description: Ensures smooth operation of the product team, focusing on process optimization and resource allocation.

Roles.title: Product Analytics Manager
Roles.description: Focuses on leveraging data and analytics to inform product decisions and improvements.

Roles.title: International Product Manager
Roles.description: Manages products targeted for international markets, requiring knowledge of global trends and multi-cultural considerations.

Roles.title: Platform Product Manager
Roles.description: Manages a platform (like an API or ecosystem of products/services), focusing on its scalability and the value it provides to users and developers.
